member.name: IDxcCompilerArgs.AddArguments
member.summary: Adds additional arguments to this list of compiler arguments.
member.param: An array of pointers to arguments to add.
The number of arguments to add.

member.name: IDxcCompilerArgs.AddArgumentsUTF8
member.summary: Adds additional UTF-8-encoded arguments to this list of compiler arguments.
member.param: An array of pointers to UTF-8 arguments to add.
The number of arguments to add.

member.name: IDxcCompilerArgs.AddDefines

member.param: An array of defines to add.
The number of defines to add.
